name: Survival RPG: Open World Pixel
description:
Survival RPG: Open World is a free 2D pixel RPG game (Role Playing Games) set in a fantasy retro style open world. Rediscover your favorite medieval places (castles, dungeons, temples), warriors and monsters (dinosaurs, sharks, wizards) from the retro 2D pixel Survival RPG series in a new exploration survival game! It can also be played offline.

This time you create your own story: you decide where you go and what you do. Your quest is to become a warrior to survive, explore, fight monsters in this medieval open world. Build shelters, find food and water, explore dungeons and castles, craft armors and swords and mine precious metals. In this game, you can also build your own houses, farm and harvest food and craft a ship to conquer the ocean and fight sea monsters like sharks. Watch out for danger, fight monsters and search for treasure chests along the way.

To explore and survive your epic quest :

- Plant forests, craft houses and decorate them
- Discover hidden objects in caves, dungeons, medieval castles, temples
- Go on a treasure hunt with treasure maps
- Build shelters and campfire, farm and harvest food
- Craft bridges and tools to explore dungeons, islands, deserts, jungles, oceans
- Build ship to conquer the ocean and fight sea monsters like sharks
- Fight dragons, dinosaurs, wizards and other monsters
- Lots of warriors’ armors, weapons, swords, and other gear to craft
- Craft recipes that will unlock during your quest and exploration
- Mine precious metals like gold and silver
- Several quests offered by RPG characters
- 2D pixel RPG game (Role Playing games)
- Free offline retro game

Enjoy Survival RPG: Open World, an epic free 2D pixel RPG game (Role Playing Games) of exploration, survival and quest! Hours of play in this retro 2D pixel RPG game of warriors against monsters.

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/survivaladventurethegame/
